name: Project_CyberpunkDetective
description:
This is a project that I am currently working on, the premise is that you are a detective hunting down bounties and stopping criminals in a dark Cyberpunk like world. What will you discover in the underbelly of the city? Or is the real crime in the penthouses atop towers owned by the rich?

Please bare in mind that this project is in its infancy and is still being worked on. It is in no way complete I would just like to show what I am currently developing!
